leshy:TooFastTooSoon.NAME: Too Fast Too Soon
leshy:TooFastTooSoon.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable above half health. NL Sacrifice all your Creatures. NL Summon a Grizzly with leshy:Mighty_Leap and leshy:Transient for each orb slot. NL Exhaust
leshy:TooFastTooSoon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable above half health. NL Sacrifice all your Creatures. NL Summon a Grizzly with leshy:Mighty_Leap, leshy:Transient, and 4 more Attack and Health for each orb slot. NL Exhaust

leshy:StruckGold.NAME: Struck Gold
leshy:StruckGold.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice any number of creatures. Summon a Gold Nugget with their current Health. NL Exhaust
leshy:StruckGold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice any number of creatures. Summon a Gold Nugget with their current Health.

leshy:GoFish.NAME: Go Fish
leshy:GoFish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Return a creature to hand.

leshy:FilmRoll.NAME: Film Roll
leshy:FilmRoll.DESCRIPTION: Craft a Deathcard using your master deck. NL Exhaust

leshy:TrialOfWisdom.NAME: Trial of Wisdom
leshy:TrialOfWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Select a Sigil from among them to give to a creature. NL Exhaust
leshy:TrialOfWisdom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Select a Sigil from among them to give to a creature.

leshy:TrialOfKin.NAME: Trial of Kin
leshy:TrialOfKin.DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If 2 or more share a Tribe, put them into your hand. NL Exhaust
leshy:TrialOfKin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If 2 or more share a Tribe, put them into your hand.

leshy:TrialOfRarity.NAME: Trial of Rarity
leshy:TrialOfRarity.DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If there is a Rare card, select 1 of 3 random Boons. NL Exhaust
leshy:TrialOfRarity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If there is a Rare card, select 1 of 3 random Boons. NL Exhaust

leshy:BoonOfTheAmbidextrous.NAME: Ambidextrous
leshy:BoonOfTheAmbidextrous.DESCRIPTION: Draw an additional card each turn.

leshy:BoonOfTheForest.NAME: Forest
leshy:BoonOfTheForest.DESCRIPTION: leshy:Summon a Grand Fir for each empty orb slot.

leshy:BoonOfTheMagpiesEye.NAME: Magpie's Eye
leshy:BoonOfTheMagpiesEye.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 fewer card each turn. At the start of each turn, put a card from your draw pile into your hand.

leshy:TrialOfBlood.NAME: Trial of Blood
leshy:TrialOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If their total Blood cost is 4 or more, select 1 of 3 leshy:Powerful creatures to Summon. NL Exhaust
leshy:TrialOfBlood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If their total Blood cost is 4 or more, select 1 of 3 leshy:Powerful creatures to Summon.

leshy:Voucher.NAME: Voucher
leshy:Voucher.DESCRIPTION: Choose a creature to replace this with permanently. NL Exhaust

leshy:Glitch.NAME: Glitch
leshy:Glitch.DESCRIPTION: At start of combat, leshy:Glitch a random creature in your deck and exhaust this.

leshy:Knife.NAME: Knife
leshy:Knife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X Damage. If Fatal, gain a leshy:Pelt. NL Exhaust

leshy:Roadkill.NAME: Roadkill
leshy:Roadkill.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, if you have a Squirrel in hand, exhaust a Squirrel and this.

leshy:OldDataHead.NAME: Twin Headed
leshy:OldDataHead.DESCRIPTION: Your totem can have an additional head.

leshy:OldDataLeft.NAME: Extra Attacks
leshy:OldDataLeft.DESCRIPTION: The creature in the leftmost orb slot triggers end of turn effects an additional time.

leshy:OldDataTop.NAME: Stack the Deck
leshy:OldDataTop.DESCRIPTION: Once per shuffle, you may right click to move a card in your deck to the top.

leshy:OldDataSquirrel.NAME: Squirrel Deck+
leshy:OldDataSquirrel.DESCRIPTION: Squirrel Deck may be activated any number of times.

leshy:OldDataUpgrade.NAME: Upgrades
leshy:OldDataUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: The first non leshy:Transient creature you summon each turn is upgraded !M! time. (Stacks)

leshy:OldDataBlood.NAME: Life to Blood
leshy:OldDataBlood.DESCRIPTION: You may play creatures costing Blood you cannot afford and lose !M! HP per missing Blood.

leshy:OldDataBear.NAME: Bear
leshy:OldDataBear.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, add a Grizzly with Ethereal and leshy:Transient to your hand.

leshy:OldDataStatic.NAME: Glitched Cards
leshy:OldDataStatic.DESCRIPTION: leshy:Glitched creatures gain !M! Attack and Health. (Stacks)

leshy:OldDataSacrifice.NAME: Blood to Squirrel
leshy:OldDataSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: On right click, sacrifice a Blood cost creature and add Squirrels to hand equal to its Blood cost.

leshy:OldDataPliers.NAME: Pliers
leshy:OldDataPliers.DESCRIPTION: When you lose HP, gain !M! Gold and deal !M! Damage to all enemies. (Stacks)
